definition: Vatican City, capital of Holy See
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

sentences.english: The full name of the Vatican, "Vatican City State", was built in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡全稱“梵蒂岡城國”，建於1929年。

sentences.english: You can see him her taking part on the Palm Sunday service in Vatican City.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到他參加在梵蒂岡城棕枝全日的情景。

sentences.english: In contemporary usage it refers to the Pontifical Swiss Guard of Vatican City .
sentences.chinese: 在當代的用法是指對教皇的瑞士衛隊梵蒂岡城。
